description:
Things are only getting worse... Not only are the people on land under Sedna`s control, but so are the people of the sea – including Warin and Sam! They climb out onto the shore, armed with weapons and ready to fight. A terrible battle is about to begin!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Heart of Light, Heart of Darkness
Hikari no Kokoro Yami no Kokoro
